summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1169, for the improvement of Jackson Street from Twelfth Avenue South to Twentieth Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer with all necessary appurtenances, therein under Ordinance No. 12944 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
